text: Carcharocles, also known as Otodus or Carcharocles megalodon, is a species of giant shark that lived during the Cenozoic era in the Middle Miocene epoch. It lived at the same time and place as sea-dwelling mammals, which were its favorite prey options. It was a predator in its own right, and one of the largest sharks ever. == Prey == Otodus had a lot of prey options, ranging from whales, to mammals who spent their lives in water. == Media == Otodus has appeared in series such as Life On Our Planet, and movies like The Meg. It made an inactive appearance in the novel The Lost World. Category:Sharks Category:Extinct fish
title: Otodus
